description: Create GraphQL resolvers for schedule management operations. Add mutations: createTemporalSchedule, pauseTemporalSchedule, resumeTemporalSchedule, deleteTemporalSchedule. Add queries: temporalSchedule (by ID), temporalSchedules (list with pagination). Apply @RequireRole(ADMIN) decorator for admin-only access. Integrate with TemporalService methods. Return typed responses with schedule details.
title: Add GraphQL Mutations and Queries for Schedule Management

descriptionHistory.description: Create GraphQL resolvers for schedule management operations. Add mutations: createTemporalSchedule, pauseTemporalSchedule, resumeTemporalSchedule, deleteTemporalSchedule. Add queries: temporalSchedule (by ID), temporalSchedules (list with pagination). Apply @RequireRole(ADMIN) decorator for admin-only access. Integrate with TemporalService methods. Return typed responses with schedule details.
